author: yasterisk
content: Yes, and now that I think it through I realize that's not necessarily the case since they presumably start at different times and different histories.... But for some reason I assumed the consensus indexes onto the execution. But of course the beacon block number is not the same as the mainnet block number now before the merge, so they shouldn't be same after the merge.

author: yasterisk
content: But I didn't grasp this until I read <@340345049063882753> 's reply.

author: parithosh
content:
Last time around we had some "scaffold" docs with the basic info out (Will hope to have that out by Wednesday). Then the community wrote more verbose docs, made videos, etc and tagged us so we added links back to the scaffold docs. 

I think that approach worked quite well last time around, happy to try some new approach as well.
